title: My account was hacked, still waiting for Support to Respond with "good news?"
body:
Hello. 

My account of 6 (I think) years was hacked (transferred to another region and I can no longer log the account in on the website on ANY region, which means they also changed the password), and I sent in a ticket to Riot Support. I can no longer view the ticket, however I have received responses via email and have been responding to those and that seems to be working fine.
After I sent in a ticket, Magistrate Tempus asked for some information, and I provided him with all the information I could (via email), and then 2 days later he sent me another response saying "Rest assured, good news is on the way!."
That response was sent to me on 1/28. I have sent him another response via email telling him that I am looking forward to the news, but I have not gotten any response with any "news." I am getting worried because I do NOT have access to the email that I used for that account anymore(it is so old!). I'm just wondering if anyone else has any experience with this? I am just getting really nervous and am paranoid that the hackers somehow got to Riot support and cancelled out the tickets or something (since I cannot view the ticket/responses on this account on the "Support" page, I can only view responses on the email associated with this account).

Please respond. My anxiety is extremely high...

Thanks!

replies.body: Don't worry Carrot, we'll get this sorted out! Can you provide me your ticket number so I can look into this for you?
The most recent number that Magistrate Tempus gave me in the email is #25252536. Thank you for the response.
I pinged your specialist who is working towards resolving your account recovery case, and everything's going smoothly.  Hang tight, and he'll get back to you as soon as possible!
Thank you! I've got my account back! :)
